room_title: Escape room "Mission I: The Abstrusus" by Zero Escape Rooms in Great Falls
review: My husband and I liked the Abstrusus Room. It was challenging and well made. Seth was personable and helpful. We will be back for more when there are more rooms available.

room_title: Escape room "Mission I: The Abstrusus" by Zero Escape Rooms in Great Falls
review: The owner is friendly and passionate about the business. The Abstrusus Museum Room is interesting and thoughtfully developed. This is a great family activity that requires working together as a team. If you're on a tight budget, this might seem expensive. I think it's worth every penny.
